bibl.title: Mummies and Death in Egypt. Forword by Jean YOYOTTE. Translated from the French by David LORTON.
bibl.note: Éd. originale: Les momies et la mort en Égypte (Paris, 1998).
DUNAND Françoise and Roger LICHTENBERG, Mummies and Death in Egypt. Forword by Jean YOYOTTE. Translated from the French by David LORTON.
Ithaca, New York, Cornell University Press, 2006, 8°, xvi-234 pp., ill. ISBN 978-0-8014-4472-2. $39.95.
